title: helpppppppppppppppp!!!
body:
I seem to login perfectly fine, make it to champion select fine.. then when the game is suppose to commence (straight after champ select) my LoL does not come up at all. When i try to reopen, it says i must close the first program in order to re-log in.. 
It says my kernel patcher wasn't working or something... i've gone through everything and done a numerous amount of reinstalling etc.. cannot find a solution.. it just randomly did this.. have happily been playing for two years now, no problems..
HELPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP :( </3

replies.body: I am on Oceania... how do I go about application switching?

Alt+Tab on Windows, fuck me if I know the equivalent on Mac. Maybe I should have said "application focus switching" instead.

Edit: For future reference, using the "Reply" button to reply to me will actually give me a notification that you replied.
What OS are you on? Have you tried application switching?
